page.title: 08NASSINGTON PEOPLES JOBS.
page.content: We sent out a survey to the parents of children at school to find out what jobs they do. We got replies from 60 people.18 of the 29 mothers are housewives.The rest have jobs, mostly part-time teaching and secretarial work. One is training to be an accountant. Only 2 fathers worked in Nassington,one an accountant the other a marketing consultant. 6 worked in neighbouring villages, as export sales manager, engineer and salesman,2 plant operators,local government officer and a grain trading director. 14 of the fathers worked in Peterborough, as company division manager, motor engineer, chartered surveyor, design and develotment manager, advertising manager, systems team leader in computers,banking executive, 2 pub- lishers,director, accounting manager, quality assurance,teacher, architect.
